text_block_list.text: A few days later, we were looking over documents in the library…… I brought up what the instructor told me about Zenno Rob Roy the other day.
choice_data_list: You were going to enter the Sports Festival, right?
You were going to enter the Sports Festival, right?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh, ah, yeah……! So you knew already……!
Zenno Rob Roy seemed bewildered at first, but she seemed to understand when I mentioned her instructor told me.
The Sports Festival is an event held at Tracen Academy. There were some students focused on conditioning their bodies for these races.
choice_data_list: Do your best! I'll be cheering for you!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… thank you…… very much……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Ah, no, it's not that I'm not thankful for that! I'm sorry, it's just…… I'm not the type that stands out.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That's why…… I think even if you took the time to come and watch, I don't think there's much you'd notice about me…… is what I think.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……if you've already spoken with the instructor, then Trainer-san…… I'm sure you already know, right? How poorly I've been doing lately.
choice_data_list: Sorry, for prying……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: No! Thank you very much for being concerned about me. It's true that lately, I've been at a loss…… ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ever since I was young, I've never really had any specialties. My favorite thing has always been only books pretty much…… it's extremely plain.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: And me too, I'm used to being unremarkable. Even if someone comes to see me, it's…… still embarrassing……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: At the very least, I wanted to get good enough that I wouldn't be embarrassed, but I was anxious, too anxious…… and ended up hurting myself again.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Just being there, in a place where people's gazes naturally gather, like the hero of a story…… it's almost funny how far away that feels.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: It's pathetic…… like this, I can't even live up to my name.
choice_data_list: Live up to your name?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… Ah, well, you see……
Saying that, Zenno Rob Roy, grabbed a book from the shelf without even pausing.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: 『Rob Roy』 ……my name is the same as the hero written about in this story.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Defeating the strong, protecting the weak. Continuing to fight on to restore his family's honor, the people's hero…… completely different from me.
choice_data_list: Rob Roy……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, ha………… I'm sorry, I'm heading back for the day……!
I tried to chase after her but, there was no way I could keep up with an Uma Musume's legs. Before I knew it, I lost sight of her……
choice_data_list: (A place that Rob Roy might go……)

text_block_list.text: After thinking for a moment, I took off. For some reason, I felt like I had a clue.
The training course―― As I thought, Zenno Rob Roy was there. Standing by herself, she was looking out over the training course from afar.
choice_data_list: Rob Roy!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh…… huh? Trainer-san!? Why are you here……!?
choice_data_list: I didn't think you'd just head home

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I-I'm pretty sure that the situation would make it seem like I was heading home though……!
choice_data_list: But you have a hard time giving up
But you have a hard time giving up

text_block_list.text: I pulled out the notebook I picked up yesterday. Contained within was her struggles through trial and error, it was proof of Zenno Rob Roy's refusal to give up.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's……! D-did you by chance, look inside……!?
choice_data_list: Sorry, I wanted to confirm the owner……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah, Ahaha…… it's really silly isn't it? Acting like I've given up, but then writing like that in my notebook.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Even if it's not possible…… Sorry for letting you see something so weird. It's fine if you throw that away.
choice_data_list: I won't thow it away

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah…… Y-you're right, sorry about that. I should properly throw it away myself―
choice_data_list: I just wanted to confirm

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Confirm……?
choice_data_list: Rob Roy. What is your dream?
Rob Roy. What is your dream?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah……!…… ………… ……I …………y-you won't laugh?
choice_data_list: I won't laugh. Promise

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: The truth is, I…… I saw a dream where I became a hero.
She spoke softly if she was telling some huge secret, but also as if it was a very precious treasure.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: E-even though my debut is late…… even though I don't have anything I can call results, and I haven't gotten the attention of anyone……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Even then, I want to cling to the word, Hero.
choice_data_list: It's a good dream
It's a good dream

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh……?
The reason she started this 『Hero Search』, why she skipped training, and even the reason she ran all the way here―
All of that was because Zenno Rob Roy hadn't given up on the dream, 『I will become a Hero』.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……that's not true. It's a shameless and cruel dream.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Among my senpai, classmates, and kouhai, there are lots of girls who are amazing, strong, and stand out like Heroes.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: They all have such wonderful dreams…… the kind that a story can be based on. Like wanting to protect the honor of their family, or wanting to make the people watching happy!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I don't have something like that, I just want to stand out, I just want people to look at me……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I don't have a story! That's why I've always been in the background……!
choice_data_list: ……but you still want to be a Hero?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
choice_data_list: Lend me your notebook
Lend me your notebook

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: O-okay……?
I take out a permanent marker. I don't open the notebook, I only need the cover.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh, w-what are you doing? Um……?
Now, it's no longer just a 『Notebook』, and I hand it back to Zenno Rob Roy.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: 『The Heroic Tale of Zenno Rob Roy』……?
choice_data_list: I want to read this!
I want to read this!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh――Eeeeh!?
A dream that can't be given up, that's how strong her wish is. If she keeps striving for it, someday―― No, I want it to be granted.
choice_data_list: Let me help with your training
Let me help with your training

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I'm weak and don't stand out…… you might even get fed up with me……? Is that really okay……?
I nod emphatically. For now, the 『Hero Search』 is on hold. ――Now, I want to see this story.
